title: Design of Adaptive Blended MOOCs for Teacher Professional Development (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and social studies instruction experience
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course for pre-service and in-service teachers to enhance professional expertise, requiring design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design and apply three or more adaptive learning strategies tailored to social studies contexts.
Learners can develop a project-based instructional plan incorporating MOOC content in a blended learning environment.
Learners can evaluate educational activities using a learner-customized feedback system in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
